title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Skills: Social Studies Integrated Education Design with Augmented Reality (VR/AR)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Foundational Knowledge in Social Studies
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Following the TSED learning model (Explain-Show-Do-Create), learners can design social studies lesson plans using VR/AR content.
Through collaboration, learners can complete project outcomes utilizing VR simulations for historical site exploration or AR tools for social phenomenon analysis.
Learners can conduct peer and self-assessments according to a digital literacy evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
